titles.title: A resolution making Republican appointments to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry, the Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs, and the Committee on Small Business.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Appoints Senator Karnes, Nebraska, to the following committees for the 100th Congress: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; and (2) Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs; and (3) Small Business.
